name: get_all_motivational_pictures
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool motivational_content.
Tool description: Get motivational quotes and motivational pictures.
API description: This endpoint fetches all the pictures. However, you can use 'skip' and 'limit' parameters to do pagination.

limit.description: The maximum number of pictures to retrieve. Defaults to None.

skip.description: The number of pictures to skip before starting to retrieve. Defaults to None.
